UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Screening and Rational Design of Hepatitis C Virus Entry Inhibitory Peptides Derived From GB Virus A NS5A
Literature.Author: Liu X, Huang Y, Cheng M, Pan L, Si Y, Li G, Niu Y, Zhao L, Zhao J, Li X, Chen Y, Yang W

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Hepatitis C virus (HCV)(IC50 I=>20µM),Hepatitis C virus (HCV)(0-10% Inhibition=20µM)
